message: The OTHER_DOC field for indicator 6-5-1, translated into all languages

data.en: 1. National Water Resources Plan (PNRH) 2020 -2024, Resolution Nr 11/2019, of 12 March; 2. Action Plan for the Implementation of Water Resources Development Goals (PA-ODS RH) 2015-2030, Resolution Nr.
